integrations.name: Make.com
integrations.description: Connect your Dub workspace to 2,000+ apps via Make.com.
integrations.readme:
This is the official Make.com integration for Dub. Make.com lets you connect Dub with thousands of the most popular apps in just a few clicks. Choose from thousands of ready-made apps or use our no-code toolkit to connect to apps.

## Features

The following modules are supported.
- Create a link
- Update a link
- Retrieve a link
- Upsert a link
- Delete a link
- Make an API Call

## How to install
1. Click on "Enable"
2. Allow Make.com to access your Dub workspace
3. Now, you can use Dub modules in Make.com to create visual automated workflows.

integrations.name: Raycast
integrations.description: Shorten and manage your links directly in Raycast.
integrations.readme:
This is the official Raycast integration for Dub.

## Features

- Shorten links & assign tags to them
- See a list of short links along with their respective analytics

## How to install

You can install the Dub Raycast integration [here](https://d.to/ray).

integrations.name: Zapier
integrations.description: Connect your Dub workspace to 7,000+ apps via Zapier.
integrations.readme:
This is the official Zapier integration for Dub. It's easy to implement, does not require coding, and allows you to connect Dub with other apps in minutes.

## Supported actions

**Dub Links**:
- [Create link](https://dub.co/docs/api-reference/endpoint/create-a-link)
- [Retrieve link](https://dub.co/docs/api-reference/endpoint/retrieve-a-link)
- [Update link](https://dub.co/docs/api-reference/endpoint/update-a-link)
- [Upsert link](https://dub.co/docs/api-reference/endpoint/upsert-a-link)
- [Delete link](https://dub.co/docs/api-reference/endpoint/delete-a-link)

**Dub Partners**:
- [Track a lead event](https://dub.co/docs/api-reference/endpoint/track-lead)
- [Track a sale event](https://dub.co/docs/api-reference/endpoint/track-sale)

## Supported triggers

**Dub Links**
- `link.created`
- `link.updated`
- `link.deleted`
- `link.clicked`

**Dub Partners**
- `lead.created`
- `sale.created`
- `partner.enrolled`
- `partner.application_submitted`

integrations.name: Stripe
integrations.description: Track how your links are converting to sales on Stripe.
integrations.readme:
Integrate with Stripe to automatically track sale [conversion events](https://dub.co/help/article/dub-conversions) when someone makes a purchase via one of your Dub short links.

[Read the docs](https://dub.co/docs/conversions/sales/stripe) on how to set this up.

integrations.name: WordPress
integrations.readme:
This is the official WordPress Integration for Dub. It uses [Dub's API](https://dub.co/api) to programmatically shorten links inside Wordpress.

Features:
- Automatically create short links when a new post is published
- Edit short link slugs directly inside WordPress
- Track [conversion events](https://dub.co/help/article/dub-conversions) from link click to account signups

integrations.name: Slack
integrations.description: Shorten and manage your links directly in Slack.
integrations.readme:
This is the official Slack integration for Dub to create and share short links directly in Slack.

## Features
- Shorten links directly in Slack
- Customize the domain and link path if needed

## How to install
1. Click on "Enable"
2. Allow Dub to send messages to your Slack channels
3. You can now use Dub's slash commands `/shorten` to create short links.

integrations.name: Better Auth
integrations.description: Track Better Auth signup events with Dub Conversions.
integrations.readme: This is the official Better Auth integration for Dub to [track conversion events](https://dub.co/docs/conversions/quickstart) in your Better Auth application.

integrations.name: Cal.com
integrations.description: Track how your links are converting to meeting bookings on Cal.com.
integrations.readme:
Integrate with Cal.com to automatically track [lead conversion events](https://dub.co/docs/conversions/leads/introduction) when someone books a meeting via one of your Dub short links.

Useful for tracking SaaS enterprise leads or agency meeting bookings.

## Installation steps

1. Click on "Enable" to install the Dub app in the Cal.com App Store.
2. Set up the [`@dub/analytics` client-side script](https://dub.co/docs/sdks/client-side/introduction) on your site, and add both `app.cal.com` and `cal.com` to your [outbound domains](https://dub.co/docs/sdks/client-side/features/cross-domain-tracking).
3. Once a booking event occurs, the booker's details will automatically be tracked as a [lead event](https://dub.co/docs/conversions/leads/introduction) on Dub.

## Example App

Check out this [open-source example](https://github.com/dubinc/examples/blob/main/conversions/cal) to learn more about how to integrate Cal.com and Dub to track meeting booking events.

integrations.name: Google Tag Manager
integrations.description: Track conversion events with Google Tag Manager and Dub

integrations.name: Polar
integrations.description: Track how your links are converting to sales on Polar.

integrations.name: Hubspot
integrations.description: Track Hubspot leads/deal changes and auto-generate partner commissions on Dub.
integrations.readme:
Easily track and attribute leads and sales from HubSpot inside Dub.

## Features

- Bidirectional sync between HubSpot contacts and Dub lead events
- Automatic attribution of leads to the exact Dub link or partner
- Support for HubSpot Forms and HubSpot Meeting Scheduler
- Closed Won sale tracking

## Setup process

1. Enable conversion tracking in Dub
2. Install the `@dub/analytics` script on your site
3. Connect HubSpot via the Dub integration
4. (Optional) Set your custom **Closed Won Deal Stage ID**

Once connected, Dub gives you full visibility into your funnel — from click → lead → meeting → Closed Won revenue.

integrations.name: Typefully
integrations.description: Automatically shorten every social link on Typefully with Dub.

integrations.name: Supabase
integrations.description: Track Supabase signup events with Dub Conversions.

integrations.name: Shopify
integrations.description: Track how your links are converting to sales on Shopify.
integrations.readme:
Powerful real-time [conversion analytics](https://dub.co/analytics) for your Shopify store.

Features:
- **Real-time conversion analytics**: See how your link clicks are converting to sales
- **Customer insights**: Measure your CAC and LTV to understand ROI on marketing spend
- **AI-powered insights**: Query your analytics using natural language

[Read the docs](https://dub.co/docs/conversions/sales/shopify) on how to set this up.

integrations.name: Publer
integrations.description: Automatically shorten every social link on Publer with Dub.
integrations.readme:
**[Publer](https://publer.com)** is a social media management platform that empowers creators to schedule and publish posts across all major social networks. Through the **Dub** integration, you can automatically shorten every link you share via Publer—keeping your posts clean and engaging.

**Key Benefits**:

- **Automatic Link Shortening:** No extra steps are needed. Publer will shorten all your links in real time.  
- **Better Post Aesthetics:** Shorter links mean cleaner posts, reducing clutter and making your content more reader-friendly.  
- **Analytics & Insights:** Dub provides click tracking and analytics, allowing you to measure engagement and refine your social media strategy.

**Getting Started:**
1. Connect your Dub account in Publer’s social account settings.
2. Schedule your social media posts as usual.  
3. Sit back and let Publer automatically shorten all your links with Dub!

integrations.name: Appwrite
integrations.description: Track Appwrite signup events with Dub Conversions.

integrations.description: Track Clerk signup events with Dub Conversions.

integrations.name: Segment
integrations.description: Send and receive events between your Dub and Segment workspaces.
integrations.readme:
Connect Dub with Segment and stream real-time events from your Dub workspace to your Segment workspace.

Supported events:

- [`link.clicked`](https://dub.co/docs/concepts/webhooks/event-types#link-clicked)
- [`lead.created`](https://dub.co/docs/concepts/webhooks/event-types#lead-created)
- [`sale.created`](https://dub.co/docs/concepts/webhooks/event-types#sale-created)

Coming soon: Sending events from Segment to Dub.
